Package ICS4UProject

Class CollisionRec

java.lang.Object
ICS4UProject.GameObject
ICS4UProject.GameObjectRec
ICS4UProject.CollisionRec
All Implemented Interfaces:
CameraView, Kinetic, KineticsWithSize, PhysicsUpdate
Direct Known Subclasses:
Platform
public class CollisionRec extends GameObjectRec
represents a rectangular object that can return collision data with other objects

      public CollisionRec(double x, double y, double sizeX, double sizeY)

      Parameters:
      x - position in x-axis
      y - position in y-axis
      sizeX - the width of the object
      sizeY - the height of the object

  • Method Details

    • collideWith

      public CollisionEvent collideWith(KineticsWithSize o)
      Creates a collision event, checks which collider a "KineticWithSize" object collides with, sets that in a boolean[] array, checks how deep the object is in the collider(s) , and sets that in the double[] array
      Parameters:
      o - an game object to collide with
      Returns:
      CollisionEvent object
